title: Ticket #3430: Blahp SGE status script doesn't signal error properly
description:
In one failure case, the blahp script sge_helper prints "Error" to stdout and terminate with exit code 0. The caller looks at the exit code to detect whether the script succeeded. We need to fix the exit code be non-zero in this case.

This issue is also tracked as OSG Jira ticket CAMPUS-70: http://jira.opensciencegrid.org/browse/CAMPUS-70
check_ins: 2013-Jan-10 11:15   Check-in [34577]: Adding non-zero exit when an error occurs to sge_helper #3430 OSG Jira CAMPUS-70 Committer: Jaime Frey (By Derek Weitzel )
creator: jfrey
